article.headline: Bull trend strengthens, S&P 500 extends October breakout
article.body: U.S. stocks are higher early Friday, rising partly amid renewed fiscal stimulus-related optimism. Against this backdrop, each big three U.S. benchmark has reached less-charted territory, extending an October break to one-month highs. Before detailing the U.S. markets’ wider view, the S&P 500’s hourly chart highlights the past two weeks....
